item.title: Interview with Nathan Yau of FlowingData
item.description: Nathan Yau Nathan Yau is a graduate student in statistics at UCLA and the author of the extremely popular data visualization blog flowingdata.com. He recently published a book Visualize This-a really nice guide to modern data visualization using R, Illustrator and Javascript - which should be on the bookshelf of any statistician working on data visualization. Do you consider yourself a statistician/data scientist/or something else?
